::Sqizzy::
She double checked her figures and started to revive the bot inside the 
chamber.  She stood back as the chamber opened and out came a black wolf.  
The bot then transformed into bot mode and looked around. "Predacon Leader 
KitKat2, statis, functional." KitKat shook her head. "Wha, where am I? And 
how'd I get here?"
Squizzy smiled. "Ah, your the one they had me cl...erhm..fix up. How are you 
feeling?"
KitKat looked at the mongoose bot and smiled. "You fixed me up? I thank you. 
Now please, I must return to my troops. Tell your leader that he will have 
the appreciation of the PACK and can count on us for support in the future."
Squizzy opened her commlink. "Zardus, she's awake and ready to go."
KitKat looked at Squizzy and noticed the name that the mongoose had spoke. 
KitKat said, "Zardus? I know that name. But from where?" she muttered.


::DarkMouse::
She turned up the power to the tank and waited for the process to finish.  
The tank opened and out stepped the black wolf bot.  The bot transformed 
into bot mode. The bot was KitKat.  DarkMouse smiled,"AH, KitKat, great to 
have you back among the functional bots. How ya feelin'?"
KitKat looked at DarkMouse. "Wha? Oh, DarkMouse. What happened?"
DarkMouse started to tell KitKat about her assasination and how she was 
cloned and brought back.
KitKat looked around,"And what happened to Drillbit? If you've been asleep 
for that long and I've been in that tank, then how can I find out who's left 
of our Pack and how do we get them together again?"
DarkMouse sighed,"That I'm not sure about my leader. But for now, You must 
meet the new leader of the Predacons. And who knows, you may take your place 
back as leader."
KitKat shook her head,"I may take my place as leader, but without troops, 
it's no use being a leader. What's a leader without someone to lead? No 
DarkMouse. I'll not lead untill it's the right time. That's how I became 
leader in the first place.  I let the other leader get killed, then I took 
his place. Besides, I am worried about Drillbit. Have you heard form him?"
DarkMouse shook her head. "Not yet, but I'm awaiting a call back."
